reviews.comments: El apartamento esta muy bien ubicado funcionado todo muy limpio y tranquillo de noche para nada ruidoso
Excelente anfitriona! Un lujo! Ella y el depto! Absolutamente recomendable! Volveremos!! Gracias!!

Natalia ha sido una excelente anfitriona, resolviendo todos las necesidades que tuve. Su departamento es mucho mas lindo y acogedor que lo que parece en las fotos. El barrio es hermoso. Lo super recomiendo!
--------------------------------
Natalia has been an excellent hostess, meeting all the needs I had. Its state is much more cute and cozy than what it seems in the photos. The neighborhood is beautiful. I highly recommend it!

Excelente todo! Hermoso el departamento y muy buena ubicación! 
Natalia predispuesta a todo para que tenga el mejor hospedaje!
Nos encontramos con un lugar acogedor y cómodo. Nuestra anfitriona estuvo pendiente en todos los detalles para que nuestra estancia, en el departamento, sea placentera! Gracias Natalia!

Es un departamento puesto con muy buen gusto y muy completa, esta en una zona muy buena de Buenos Aires y hemos sido muy bien atendidos, en todo momento. Natalia se esmera mucho por atender a sus huespedes, gracias.
Hermoso departamento. Natalia excelente anfitriona, no tuvimos la oportunidad de conocerla pero estuvo atenta a lo que necesitábamos y disponible a nuestras consultas.

Departamento perfecto para hacer una visita cultural a Buenos Aires. Se puede ir a pie al MALBA, la Biblioteca Nacional y Cementerio de Recoleta.
El dpartamento es pequeño pero la distribución del espacio es excelente. Muy cómodo y en exclentes condiciones. Natalia la dueña esta muy predispuesta a solucionar cualquier inconveniente del dpto y atenta a la necesidades del huesped.

El lugar es realmente adorable, super cómodo, limpio y cálido como un hogar, me sentí como en casa aquí!
El barrio hermoso, tranquilo y seguro, con lindos lugares cerca para recorrer.
Y la anfitriona super buena onda, recibimos muy buena atención de parte de ella y mantuvimos comunicación en todo momento.

¡Más que recomendable este departamento, sin dudas que volvería!
Muy lindo el departamento y super comodo!

Todo viajero se queda inseguro al llegar a su alojamiento. En el caso del apartamento de Natalia, aseguro que el lugar es igual al anuncio: Sofá, TV, balcón, cocina, baño y cama que hacen que usted se sienta un porteño viviendo en uno de los barrios más tradicionales de Buenos Aires. Aunque la anfitriona acaba de tener un hijo, la misma ha estado en contacto frecuente con nosotros a través de mensajes sin comprometer nuestra privacidad. Deja de estar buscando horas por un buen lugar para quedarse en Buenos Aires, pues sin duda la mejor opción es el apartamento de Natalia.
Natalia es la mejor anfitriona!! El apartamento es hermoso, perfecto hasta el mínimo detalle!! La ubicación, silencioso, cómodo. Ideal para sentirse mejor que nunca.

Excelente todo, muy buena ubicación, muy buenos anfitriones!  
A la próxima
El apartamento muy lindo, acogedor y bien ubicado. Nati, muy amable, atenta y siempre respondió rápido. Sin dudas volveríamos. Muy recomendable :)

El apartamento es hermoso, compacto, pero funcional. Excelente ubicación, con buenos cafés, mercados, restaurantes y tiendas cerca. Fácil acceso al metro. Es posible ir andando a varios puntos turísticos. El único punto que creemos que podría ser mejorado es la ducha, pero así que hablamos con la anfitriona ella se dispuso a verificar el problema y repararlo. Natália es una excelente anfitriona y se ha mostrado siempre preocupada por nuestra comodidad y dispuesta a ayudarnos.

Espacio romántico y acogedor...
Ubicación privilegiada en Buenos Aires.
Anfitriona super atenta y dispuesta.
Muy recomendable

Muy linda experiencia haber compartido en este hermoso departamento con mi señora, queda en un barrio excelente, se puede ir a pie a varios atractivos turísticos.
Todo el detalle entregado en la pagina permite no encontrarse con sorpresas, es igual de lindo a como se ve en las fotos.
Natalia siempre esta atenta a resolver consultas.

Lindo departamento loft, muy acogedor, la  ubicación es excelente, a pasos de Av  Libertador y plaza Francia, cercano al subte. Barrio muy seguro y con todas las comodidades necesarias. 100% recomendable, Natalia la dueña es muy agradable, siempre atenta a cualquier cosa.
El departamento es muy lindo y cerca de todo.
reviews.response: Fue un placer recibirlos!!!Muy buena gente.un 10!!!

reviews.comments: Dpto muy bien ubicado y bien equipado. Recomiendo totalmente.
Por sobre todo, el departamento tiene una ubicación increíble para pasear por buenos aires. Es tranquilo y muy cómodo.

Natalia es una gran host. Estuvo pendiente de todo, todo el tiempo. 
Él Apartameto estaba en perfecto estado tal como se ve en las fotos. Ubicado en el sector recoleta uno de los sectores más lindo de BA.
Súper. Apartamentito lindo y todo te queda cerca. No podés pedir mejor en Buenos Aires. En uno de los mejores barrios de la ciudad.
Perfecta ubicación, el departamento está muy bien equipado, anfitrión muy preocupado, prestando muy buena asesoría turística de Buenos Aires.
El sitio es genial, un apartamento pequeño pero muy acogedor chic todo lo necesario para hacer grata la estadía, volvería siempre allí
Todo perfecto!
reviews.response: Un placer haber hospedado a Ezequiel, su mujer e hijo. Muy responsables,  y buena gente. 10puntos.

reviews.comments:
Everything was as expected. It's great located to shop and eat. A couple of blocks away there's a great place to eat some burgers, i think it was called "befrika" and if you continue walking the same street you arrive to the Recoleta Cultural Center, and right there the cementery, the movie theater and the mall. 
Its great!

We had an excellent couple of days. Natalia's flat is very well located in a pleasant residential area. There are good coffee bars and restaurants a few minutes walk away. There is a metro station nearby, providing easy access to most of the city. The flat is very bright, and being on the top floor it has an open view over the neighborhood. It is comfortable but quite small, suitable only for a  couple, although there is an extra bed in a mezzanine. 
Natalia was an excellent host, responding promptly to messages and very accommodating to our needs. She was very helpful in providing local information and even booked a taxi for us, making sure we arrived safely at the airport. We are very grateful.
What a great spot! Cozy and felt like home! Natalia was very attentive to my every request. The best!

Interessantes Appartement - alles vorhanden, was man  für einen Aufenthalt braucht; die Unterkunft ist eher für jüngere Leute geeignet. Top Lage in der Recoleta (Einkaufscenter, Shops, Cafés, Restaurants, Museen etc. - alles in Gehdistanz)
Natalia's place was awesome, super clean and neat, lots of sunshine and a great view. The bed was comfortable also. We would stay here again
Ótimo apartamento e execelente hospitalidade!! Natália foi super solícita sempre que precisamos, mesmo estando prestes a dar à luz. Recomendo sempre!

Natalia was an amazing host. She was so helpful and attentive, and her lovely apartment was really well looked after and exactly what we needed. We loved the area of BA it was in and enjoyed coming back there after days of exploring. Thank you Natalia!

I stayed at Natalia home for a one night stay. As my home in the Faena Hotel also on Airbnb was rented for a month. I had to change my check in time on her twice as i came apond some  complications on my side. She was very helpful with changing my time communication was always quick. Which I really appreciate it. I was greeted by her amazing and lovely mother. Which was an absolute delight to met.  The apartment is an amazing location. As Recoleta  is extremely safe and  stylish .  As of the apartment itself. It is very cute and cozy. Though better for A couple than a large group. She has  three different locations for people to sleep. As of a small loft space , couch and bed. The apartment has all the  amenities that one would need it was clean and comfortable as well as the rest of the home. The  apartment is on the seventh top floor. But you will have to take an elevator up too. Very easy to do check in and check out. Grocery stores are within minutes away.  She was also able to give me a late check out which was much needed. I have a recommend her for your stay. In Beautiful Buenos Aires!

Natalia is a great host. She has been in constant communication with us since we booked the apartment making sure to answer any questions we had. She also helped us book a taxi to the airport on our way back. 

The apartment is as described in pictures though it may seem smaller for more than 2 people. The location in Recoleta is great and we felt very safe even coming back late at night. It is 3 blocks from Subway station and we used it extensively to go around the city and we loved it. There are a lot of shops around the block in case of a longer stay. Overall highly recommend this place.

Very cosy apartment in the very nice neighborhood of Recoleta. A nice view over the roofs of Buenos Aires. Plenty of public transport nearby . For food supply there is a cheap supermarket half block away.
Natalia was a great host and very eager to help in all issues

The location of Natalia's apartment is wonderful, the perfect spot to go out exploring the area by foot. Walking distance to amazing places like the Recoleta Cemiterium and Livraria El Ateneo. The apartment is cosy and super clean and the host is very attentive and has great tips about the city and things to do.. it was wonderful!
Great location & charming apartment.
Very good location and quick communication! Tks for the stay!

My daughter and I spent a night at Natalia's place and it was perfect for us. We didn't want to be downtown surrounded by hotel after hotel, and Natalie's place and neighborhood was perfectly situated for us. We were able to walk to key interests like the cemetery in Recoleta, the Grand Splendid Ateneo as well as the metro stop which got us to other places during our stay. The apartment was bright, cozy, and all that we needed for a weekend stay.

Apartamento perfeito, igual as fotos!
Localização ótima, sem contar a receptividade da Nati!! Sempre disponível a nos ajudar com qualquer informação!!
Voltaríamos e indicariamos!
Bom custo e benefício, essa experiência faz com que possamos conhecer a cidade de forma diferente!

Natalia is a very attentive host. We did not meet, but I nevertheless felt very well taken care of. She was in regular contact and always very concerned to make sure that I had everything i needed. The flat is in a super -central location for accessing many attractions by foot, and if you download the local taxi app (premium taxi) there is even a little lay-by across the street where the cab can pull over and pick you up. I can whole-heartedly recommend Natalia and her place.

Lugar muito aconchegante. Em uma ótima localização, próximo a mercados, restaurantes, padarias, shopping (no qual foi muito importante para trocarmos dinheiro) - casa de câmbio funciona todos os dias, com valor melhor do que o aeroporto. Natalia, sempre muito atenciosa, sempre on line no (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) onde esteve sempre nos auxiliando e muito preocupada para que não faltasse nada. Cidade muito linda, certamente voltarei.

Tivemos uma ótima estadia, tudo correu muito bem, o apartamento é pequeno mas muito funcional e confortável, com facilidades que nos auxiliaram muito. A cozinha é muito bem equipada, a banheira é relaxante e um diferencial!! A localização é ótima, tem mercado, fruteira e casa de carnes a poucos passos, táxis passam a todo instante e fica a 3 quadras do metrô que te leva a qualquer lugar da cidade e no outro sentido a 3 quadras do cemitério da Recoleta, Shopping, Praças, Galerias e Barzinhos!!! Natália sempre esteve disponível para eventuais solicitações e dúvidas pontuais que tivemos!!! 
No mais foi tudo maravilhoso, a cidade é incrível, linda, foi uma viagem inesquecível!!! Grande Abraço pra você Natália!!!
Naty's place is great! Very cute, well appointed, in a secure building in a fantastic location. I stayed by myself but the place is also perfect for couples. I'll definitely stay here again!
Great stay at Buenos Aires! Excelent location, perfect apartment for one or two, and excelent comunication with Natalia. We recommend it very much! Thank you, Natalia!!!
O apartamento é pequeno, principalmente a cama, e acomoda apenas um casal . A localização é realmente muito boa e a vizinhança perfeita! Podemos passear muito a pé!
Nati is an amazing host, she made our stay in Buenos Aires super easy. The apartment is everything you need in Buenos Aires: clean, super nice, great location. Highly recommended! Gracias Nati!

Natalia has a wonderful little apartment in the Recoleta neighbourhood. It's a small apartment, but it's got everything you need. It's located in a safe neighbourhood with quite some bars and restaurants close by. Communication with Natalia was great, although I did not meet her in person. She responded to (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) messages within maximal 15 minutes, and was ready to answer all sorts of questions. If I ever return to Buenos Aires, I won't hesitate to book this apartment again.
Apartamento com ótima localização e muito confortável.
Natalie is a very nice host and her appartement is very cosy and well located. We had a great time in BA.

Natalie is the best host I met in BA.
She help me to find car from airport to apartment, help me to exchange pesos, help me to buy Subte card. Give me advise for going to make nail color, shopping for food. And when I move out, she also help me to contact with other party to solve my situation.
For the apartment, it is comfy and clean, I sleep very well in here.
And cooking everyday.
Happy to stay in her apartment.

Cozy city pad. Perfect place to explore BA from in a comfortable, quiet, and safe neighborhood. Public transport options quite close and the neighborhood itself is very walkable. Natalia is a wonderful host, prompt $ professional communication, good suggestions, and accommodating. Would highly recommend staying here.
Muito boa a estadia no apartamento da Natália, bem localizado, confortável, ela esteve sempre preocupada com nosso conforto e praticidade. Recomendamos com certeza.
Espaço muito bom! Tem tudo que precisa na casa. Tudo foi arrumado com muito carinho e cuidado
Apartamento em ótima localização, com farmácias, restaurantes, supermercados!! Lugar maravilhoso!!
Apartamento bem localizado e próximo ao cemitério da recolherá e a poucas quadras do metrô. Apartamento antigo, porém reformado e de bom gosto. A Natália é muito atenciosa
O Apartamento é muito bom. Pequeno e aconchegante. Fica em uma área ótima da cidade onde vários passeios podem ser feitos a pé. A Anfitria foi muito prestativa em todos os quesitos. Nota 10!

Stay at Natalia´s place was a pleasant experience. The apartment itself is cozy, super clean and just a few steps away from Recoleta center where you´ll find good bars, restaurants, and touristic spots. 
Natalia is a super host: easy to get with, good communication and friendly. She made us feel like home since our first contact.
Hope see her again when in Buenos Aires. Gracias por todo!

Natalia was an excellent host. From the beginning she communicated with us and was very accomodating of us in terms of check-in and throughout the trip. She made sure we had everything we needed and was availble for any doubts or questions we had. The apartment is clean, modern and in a safe building. It is located in Recoleta in Buenos Aires and it is close to lots of awesome restaraunts and cafes. I would definitely recommend this Airbnb.

Natalia is a wonderful host! She was always available  both before and during our stay if we needed her. Her place is the perfect size for two people and has everything you need. Walking distance to recoleta cemetary and not far from sites such as casa rosada. Great restaurants and cafés in the neighbourhood. Would stay again!
A Natália foi uma excelente anfitriã, extremamente simpática, prestativa conosco. O apartamento está em perfeito estado e é exatamente como mostra nas fotos. Adoramos a estádia.

The apartment was in good conditions. Just as discribed. It is very silent and the bed is comfortable I love the fact that you can completely black out the room so you can sleep until late! There is a very nice bakery just in front of the apartment. I paid 640€ for 15 nights for two people including all fees/charges. I think that is quite expensive for such a small apartment (I guess less then 30m²).

Natalia was very communicative from day 1, about everything from the best way to get from the airport to recommendations for things to do and restaurants. The apartment is cozy, clean, and in a great location! Would definitely recommend to my friends!
Well located, compact, small double bed
Wir haben die Zeit in diesem Apartment sehr genossen! Das einzige was uns etwas gestört hat, war der Alarm am Lift (nicht so geeignet zum lange ausschlafen;)).
Apartamento confortável e bem localizado. Ideal para casais.

le studio de Natalia est très bien conçu et tire profit de tout l'espace, il est décoré et aménagé avec soin, très propre et très accueillant. Le quartier fait partie du centre ville, on y trouve tout ce dont on a besoin, boutiques, restaurants, banques, transports en commun. Natalia se préoccupe à la fois de notre bonne installation et de notre départ (bagages, taxi...). Nous avons passé un très bon séjour.

Great little studio, clean and comfortable and in a good, central location. We were in Buenos Aires for a few days for the first time and could easily get to a lot of places from the apartment. Natalia is very diligent and responds very quickly to any queries, I'd definitely recommend this apartment.
Everything is fine, thank you so much for the time. Thanks for being here and that we could stay here.  It was a pleasure for us. We would recommend this apartment. Next, we would come back.

Natalia's apartment is very tidy and is in a great location to get all around the city. It was the perfect amount of space for my friend and myself. She was very accessible and made sure that our stay went as smoothly as possible. I would definitely stay there again and recommend the same to others.
Awesome localization, it has everything one person or one couple need. The owner is very attencious and it helped a lot!
Logement sympa et bien place
Natalia was an exceptional host and her place is very nice with a great location. I would definitely recommend her condo to anyone looking for a place in Buenos Aires.

Great location, close to great restaurants and shops.  Owner was very good about communicating which is very important in a new place and country.  The unit was clean and had everything we needed for our two night stay.  Would use this unit again.  Thank you Natalia you made our stay easy and enjoyable.

Perfect place to stay in Buenos Aires. Located in a lovely area and Natalia was always quick to reply to messages, very helpful and great bubbly personality. When we arrived the wifi wasn't working and the roller door to the balcony was broken. Natalia promptly came over and provided an alternative for the time being and fixed the issues immediately the following day. I would definitely stay here again if I'm ever back in BA and definitely recommend staying here.

Big thanks to Natalia for hosting us in Buenos Aires. We had a short but wonderful 2-day stay in this town and the apartment was everything we were looking for. Clean, cozy and fully furnished in the heart of Recoleta it feels like a home away from home and Natalia and her outgoing, friendly personality made us feel very comfortable. Definitely recommended!
Lugar aconchegante. Próximo a bons restaurantes, cafeterias e padarias. A anfitriã é muito atenciosa e está sempre em contato para prestar esclarecimentos e tratar qualquer anormalidade.

Natalia's apartment was very central and she was super quick to reply whenever we had any questions. The extra mattress in the loft space was really appreciated and makes the place a great option if you're in need of a third bed or don't want to share the double. Subway and shops are all conveniently close by and the apartment's facilities are everything they're described to be. Definitely try the Rapa Nui ice-cream just two blocks down :D
Great location and cozy. Had all the essentials for cooking and in good condition. Quiet and safe neighborhood walking distance from good restaurants and cafes, and great spot for tourism.

If you are looking for a beautifully decorated and carefully furnished apartment, this is your place! Very well located in Recoleta, this oasis of charm has everything to make you feel at home from the moment you enter the door. The views from the small balcony big enough for a table and two chairs are stunning. Last but not least, Natalia is a great host who is very responsive and accommodating to your needs regarding check-in and -out.

The apartment is small but very nice and clean and in a great location in Recoleta. Natalia has been very helpful, arranging a taxi, providing a cot, and even some toys and nappies for our baby. All the basics where provided as well. Good airco and wifi. There is a supermarket around the corner and nice places around to have breakfast. We had a great time there, overall highly recommended!
Foi tudo maravilhoso!!

Recomendamos! Primeiro porque nenhum hotel terá uma relação de custo benefício tão bom quanto o deste.
Eu e a minha esposa, nos hospedamos por 10 dias .
Localização excepcional,a passos de restaurantes, supermercados, cafés e shopping em local tranquilo.
Às fotos disponível no site transmitem a correta impressão do local.
A Natalia é uma ótima anfitriã, nós deu dicas sobre o local ( Recoleta ), passeios e se mostrou extremamente disponível.
Como Buenos Aires em dezembro é muito quente o sistema de ar-condicionado fez toda diferença , sendo impecável.
Recomendamos e agradecemos por tudo!

Our host was very accomodating.  Kept in touch with us thruout our visit.  There was a bottle of wine for our stay which we enjoyed,  The area was close to to the Recoleta cemetery and a shopping mall.  Recommend her place.

Natália foi uma anfitriã Espetacular. Só a conheci pessoalmente no último dia da viagem mas em momento algum ela deixou de ser prestativa e se nos faltava algo. 

O tempo inteiro estava preocupada com nossos passeios e nos passava todas as informações possíveis para que tivéssemos a melhor experiência em Buenos Aires. 

O apartamento é exatamente como descrito nas fotos. A cozinha é muito bem equipada a conexão wi-fi é excelente e a localização do apartamento é espetacular. 

Ao redor temos diversas cafeterias restaurantes e opções de alimentação bem como o subte se encontra apenas três quadras do local. 

Obrigada Natália por essa experiência incrível!  Esperamos retornar em breve.

Beijos!

This is the perfect place for visiting Buenos Aires!! It is centrally located, spotlessly clean and near great shops, restaurants and the best that BA has to offer.  We loved our stay and would absolutely stay again.  Natalia was made the whole process very easy and was super responsive.  If you want to have a great experience in BA, then stay here!!

We had an awesome time!!
Natalia was an awesome host from the time we first booked until after our stay at her cozy apartment. 
Natalia was excellent at communicating with us.  Always quick to respond to any questions we had.
Th day we arrived she met us personally and made us feel comfortable in her apartment  
The location was also perfect.  We felt safe and could easily walk around and the area to sight see. 
If we needed a cab we just had to walk across the street.
There is also a very delicious bakery with lots of homemade pastries directly across the street  & grocery stores just around the corner. 
Overall we cannot say enough about how good our experience was.
Thank you Natalia !

Can't recommend this place enough! It was better than described, location was amazing was equipped with everything we needed and the price was unbeatable for the value! Natalia was so attentive and helpful, even helped me with little things such as buying stamps! Would definitely come here again.

She did everything to make me comfortable. Beautiful apartment, near from everything. 
My first experience with RbnB was great I hope you could have this amazing experience too, go to Buenos Aires and stay in this apartment, I have no doubts you will love it.
Natalia is a wonderful, attentive hostess. The place is in a great, central location of Recoleta and comes highly recommend.
Very nice studio in central area, perfect for walking around and visiting Buenos Aires. Natalia was a very friendly and helpful host. Highly recommended!

Agréable séjour, proximité de tout. Accueil chaleureux
Je recommande
Thank you Natalia everything was perfect!
The Host was great and super helpful if there was anything we needed. Great location with nice restaurants and cafes. We had a really great stay.

Natalia was an excellent host. She met me at the apartment, which was exactly like on the photos - bright with a large balcony window and a view on part of Buenos Aires. It was incredibly cozy and as I was staying in Buenos Aires for whole two months, there was EVERYTHING you need for cooking/making smoothies/fresh juices. The neighbourhood is very safe and close to many historic sites. You can walk from there to pretty much anything. Natalia checked on me several times if there was anything I needed, when a light stopped working, we had the houseman coming the next day and putting a new bulb there. Fantastic experience on airbnb, highly recommend!

This place is perfect. Natalia was very accommodating and helped with any questions I had. She even helped order me a taxi to the airport. The apartment is super well located and close to great shopping and sights like the Recoleta Cemetary. It's also pretty central in the city to get to both San Telmo and Palermo. Very clean and the balcony was great! Would certainly recommend.
Natalia was an excellent host. She was very sweet and she did so much to accommodate us and our needs. I would recommend this place to anyone visiting for a little while.
The host canceled this reservation 74 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Nossa estada no apartamento de Natalia foi perfeita. Ela foi a melhor anfitriã possível, muito solícita e sempre disposta a ajudar, sempre mantivemos contato. O apartamento fica em localização privilegiada no bairro de Recoleta, perto de estações de subte linhas verde e amarela, estava muito limpo e aseado e com todos os equipamentos de cozinha necessários, novos e limpos, além de itens de higiene que foram disponibilizados pela anfritriã, todos de melhor qualidade.
